verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
[Verse 1]
In the crushing
In the pressing
You are making New Wine

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[Verse 2]
In the soil I
Not surrender
You are breaking New Ground

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So I yield to you and to your careful hand
When I trust you I don't need to understand

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Make me your vessel
Make me an offering
Make me whatever
You want me to be

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I came here with nothing
But all you have given me
Jesus bring New Wine
Out of me

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
[Verse 1 Second time]
In the crushing
In the pressing
You are making New Wine

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
[Verse 2]
In the soil I
Not surrender
You are breaking New Ground

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Make me your vessel
Make me an offering
Make me whatever
You want me to be

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
I came here with nothing
But all you have given me
Jesus bring New Wine
Out of me
Jesus bring New Wine
Out of me
Jesus bring New Wine
Out of me

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
[Outro]
Where there is New Wine
There is new power
There is new freedom
The Kingdom is here
I lay down my old flames
To carry your new fire
Today

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Where there is New Wine
There is new power
There is new freedom
The Kingdom is here
I lay down my old flames
To carry your new fire
Today

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Make me your vessel
Make me an offering
Make me whatever
You want me to be

verse.name: v13
verse.lines:
I came here with nothing
But all you have given me
Jesus bring New Wine
Out of me
Jesus bring New Wine
Out of me
Jesus bring New Wine
Out of me
